pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic 的源代码托管在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"GitHub"}],"，npm 包发布在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.npmjs.com/package/@antv/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"npm"}],"。本页帮助你快速熟悉仓库结构和核心模块，方便上手开发与贡献。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"dir","children":"目录结构 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"主要目录及用途："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-text","children":".
├── __tests__        单元与工具测试
├── dev              开发环境与调试
└── src
    ├── constants      常量定义
    ├── designs        设计资产（结构、数据项、布局、组件、装饰、标题等）
    ├── jsx            JSX 引擎（原语组件、类型、布局与渲染）
    ├── options        信息图语法定义与解析
    ├── editor         编辑器（插件、交互、命令、状态管理）
    ├── renderer       核心渲染器与风格化能力
    ├── resource       资源加载体系
    ├── runtime        运行时逻辑
    ├── templates      模板注册
    ├── themes         主题配置
    ├── types          通用类型
    └── utils          工具函数
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"modules","children":"主要功能模块 "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"JSX 引擎"}],"：在不依赖 React 的情况下解析 JSX，输出 SVG。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"设计资产"}],"：结构、数据项、装饰等视觉积木的实现集合。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"语法解析"}],"：解析信息图语法，组合出可复用的模板。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"编辑器"}],"：交互式修改画布元素的能力，包含插件体系、交互与命令/状态管理。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"渲染器"}],"：将模板与数据渲染为最终 SVG 输出，并支持导出。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"风格化"}],"：提供手绘、纹理等多种风格化效果。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"资源加载"}],"：加载外部图标、插图等资源，并提供自定义扩展。"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"dev","children":"快速开发 "}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"克隆代码："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git clone git@github.com:antvis/infographic.git
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"安装依赖："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"cd infographic
npm install
cd dev
npm install
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"3","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"启动开发环境："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"# 位于 dev 目录下运行
npm run dev
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"contribute","children":"提交 PR "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"欢迎任何形式的贡献——修复 bug、补充文档、添加功能都很宝贵。"}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"创建分支："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"提交更改："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git commit -m "Add your feature description"
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"3","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"推送分支："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git push origin feature/your-feature-name
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"4","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"创建 Pull Request："}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在 GitHub 提交 Pull Request，并简要说明变更目的和影响。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"os-plan","children":"开源计划 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic 将持续开放更多能力，欢迎社区参与共建。下面是下一阶段的开源计划："}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_qa8qxu/afts/img/A*15OrQo7ftkAAAAAASxAAAAgAemJ7AQ/original","alt":"open source plan"}]]}]]

pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["The source code for AntV Infographic is hosted on ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/antvis/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"GitHub"}],", and the npm package is published on ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.npmjs.com/package/@antv/infographic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"npm"}],". This page helps you quickly become familiar with the repository structure and core modules, making it easy to start development and contribution."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"dir","children":"Directory Structure "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Main directories and their purposes:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-text","children":".
├── __tests__        Unit and utility tests
├── dev              Development environment and debugging
└── src
    ├── constants      Constant definitions
    ├── designs        Design assets (structures, items, layouts, components, decorations, titles, etc.)
    ├── jsx            JSX engine (primitive components, types, layouts, and rendering)
    ├── options        Infographic syntax definition and parsing
    ├── editor         Editor (plugins, interactions, commands, state management)
    ├── renderer       Core renderer and stylization capabilities
    ├── resource       Resource loading system
    ├── runtime        Runtime logic
    ├── templates      Template registration
    ├── themes         Theme configuration
    ├── types          Common types
    └── utils          Utility functions
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"modules","children":"Main Functional Modules "}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"JSX Engine"}],": Parses JSX without relying on React, outputs SVG."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Design Assets"}],": Collection of visual building blocks including structures, items, decorations, etc."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Syntax Parsing"}],": Parses infographic syntax to compose reusable templates."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Editor"}],": Interactive canvas element modification capabilities, including plugin system, interactions, and command/state management."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Renderer"}],": Renders templates and data into final SVG output, supports export."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Stylization"}],": Provides various stylization effects such as hand-drawn, textures, etc."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Resource Loading"}],": Loads external icons, illustrations, and other resources, with custom extension support."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"dev","children":"Quick Development "}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Clone the code:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git clone git@github.com:antvis/infographic.git
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Install dependencies:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"cd infographic
npm install
cd dev
npm install
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"3","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Start development environment:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"# Run from the dev directory
npm run dev
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"contribute","children":"Submit PR "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"We welcome all forms of contribution—bug fixes, documentation improvements, and feature additions are all valuable."}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Create a branch:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"2","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Commit changes:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git commit -m "Add your feature description"
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"3","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Push branch:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-bash","children":"git push origin feature/your-feature-name
"}]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"start":"4","children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Create Pull Request:"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Submit a Pull Request on GitHub with a brief description of the purpose and impact of the changes."}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"os-plan","children":"Open Source Plan "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"AntV Infographic will continue to open more capabilities, and we welcome community participation. Here is the open source plan for the next phase:"}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_qa8qxu/afts/img/A*15OrQo7ftkAAAAAASxAAAAgAemJ7AQ/original","alt":"open source plan"}]]}]]
